settings.title: Request your free appointment
settings.text: You’ll have all the time you need to have a proper look at the range and we’ll help you narrow down your options with advice on the best products for the job.

At Goldcrest Blinds, we are committed to inspiring our customers to create the perfect look for their homes with the highest quality window dressings. Our dedication to customer satisfaction is evidenced by the number of clients who return to us and recommend our services to family and friends.

As a family-run business, we value the relationships we build with our customers and strive to provide a thoroughly satisfying experience. Our team of experts is dedicated to helping you find the ideal window solutions that enhance both the comfort and beauty of your living spaces.

settings.headline: A no fuss 5 star easy service
settings.text: A no fuss 5 star easy service who deliver as promised! It’s great to work with a company who know their business and deliver for their customers

settings.text: Really pleased with the whole experience. Good communication from the start. Friendly and efficient staff throughout the process and I'm absolutely delighted with the blinds that have been fitted.

settings.headline: Replaced blinds in the conservatory door
settings.text: Replaced blinds in the conservatory door with a different frame design from the original. The quality of the replacement is excellent and we are very pleased withe the outcome. Should any other blinds need replacing Goldcrest will be the first choice.

settings.headline: Excellent service
settings.text:
Lots of lovely blinds to choose from and good prices.
Salesman Ronnie was excellent as was the guy who came to install my blinds. Very kindly took down old blind fittings as my husband and I could not manage this. Blinds fitted quickly and no mess.
settings.author: Mrs Elizabeth Young

settings.card_text: Established in 1989, we’re a family-run business in Stirling, proudly manufacturing quality made-to-measure blinds, curtains and shutters in Scotland. With decades of experience, we remain committed to personal service and trusted local craftsmanship.
We proudly serve both homes and businesses — from bespoke blinds and curtains for local customers to large projects for schools, offices and the NHS, where we’ve held contracts for several years.
Every blind, curtain, and shutter is custom-made in our factory in Scotland for a flawless fit, using the highest quality materials to complement your space beautifully.
